scripts.fresh: bunx rimraf node_modules && bunx concurrently --names "renterd,hostd,walletd" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "cd renterd && bun run fresh" "cd hostd && bun run fresh" "cd walletd && bun run fresh"
scripts.lint: bunx concurrently --names "renterd,hostd,walletd" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "bun run lint:renterd" "bun run lint:hostd" "bun run lint:walletd"
scripts.download:all: bunx concurrently --names "renterd,hostd,walletd" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "bun run download:renterd" "bun run download:hostd" "bun run download:walletd"
scripts.workspaces:add: jq '.workspaces=["renterd","hostd","walletd"]' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json
scripts.workspaces:remove: jq 'del(.workspaces)' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json
scripts.version: bun run workspaces:add && bunx --yes @changesets/cli version && bun run workspaces:remove
scripts.release: bun run workspaces:add && bunx --yes @changesets/cli publish && bun run workspaces:remove
